Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the critical driver program and amending the persistent violators program relating to drivers of taxicabs and for-hire vehicles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Repealing the critical driver program and amending the persistent violators program relating to drivers of taxicabs and for-hire vehicles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notification of expiration of variances and special permits granted by the board of standards and appeals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Notification of expiration of variances and special permits granted by the board of standards and appeals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notification of expiration of variances and special permits granted by the board of standards and appeals
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Notification of expiration of variances and special permits granted by the board of standards and appeals.
